pullrequest.title: issue #1144 fix inertia ratio reduction error with hardcoded ratio limit. check for violation of line criterion. added test.

content.html:
Is this "abs sum of off diagonals" or "sum of abs off diagonals"?

ie "sum of abs off diagonals" to me means:

for (i=0; i<N; ++i)
  sumAbsOffDiags += abs(offDiagonals[i]);

while "abs sum of off diagonals" means

for (i=0; i<N; ++i)
  sumAbsOffDiags += offDiagonals[i];
sumAbs = abs(sumAbsOffDiags);

Why not actually spell it out:

// To do this, first compute the sum of the absolute values of the off diagonal terms and store in sumAbsOffDiags.
